one_reviews_text:
I have tried to follow the tutorials but there always comes a point where you wait for an action or something happens, but it can never be completed. Not even in the simplest things like the grip or zoom works: I do the grip and / or zoom but the game does not realize it and keeps asking me to do it. I have only been able to complete tutorial 1, so I have not been able to enjoy the game. I wait a few days for an answer or I will request a refund.

Has any developer even tried it?
